Token.Abstract: An instance of OKBrowserHandler opens http and https URLs in a third-party web browser.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: A URL to open. Must have either http: or https: as its scheme.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A UIActivityViewController to present modally if the user must pick a third-party app. Otherwise nil.

Token.Abstract: Opens a URL with a callback

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: A URL to open. Must have either http: or https: as its scheme.

Parameter.Name: callback
Parameter.Abstract: A URL to be opened by the third-party app when the action has been completed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A UIActivityViewController to present modally if the user must pick a third-party app. Otherwise nil.
